features: Hydrate & Nourish Your Skin - This powerful daytime moisturizer for face is specially formulated to replenish moisture and restore elasticity to the skin. Help your skin feel smooth, supple, and soft once again.

Peptide Moisturizer for Face - Strengthen Your Skin - Our collagen moisturizer contains Hexapeptide-9, which contributes to skin rejuvenation and skincare for women. Defy aging by giving your skin that extra boost of nourishment.

Collagen Face Cream Anti Aging Cream for Women - Use regularly to help firm up your skin, and slow the formation of wrinkles. Enjoy that sun kissed, youthful glow for years to come with Collagen ++ Anti-wrinkle cream.

Everything Your Skin Craves - The collagen cream for face also contains other skin softening ingredients: Centella Asiatica, Dead Sea minerals, Argan oil, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Coconut oil and Sweet Almond oil.

Lightweight - Easily Absorbed - Collagen ++ collagen cream for face has the perfect consistency, and is absorbed beautifully, without leaving greasy residue. Gently massage onto your face and neck - suitable for normal to dry skin. Pamper yourself, with a daily moisturizing routine!
body.description: Supremely Nourishing, Age Defying, Rejuvenating Complex - Meet Collagen ++ Collagen ++ brings you a nourishing anti-aging complex - formulated with Collagen peptide and enriched with skin rejuvenating ingredients. Enjoy silky smooth, glowing skin, and luxuriate in your new self-care skin routine. Collagen ++ Skin Care Highlights-Beautifully Absorbed - Perfect creamy consistency.- 1,7 fl oz - A little bit goes a long way.-Age Defying - Strengthening and firming skin ingredients.- Reduce Wrinkles - Collagen peptide promote skin rejuvenation. - Designed for normal to dry skinCollagen ++ Deeply Moisturizing Formula Give your skin exactly what it needs. Our deeply moisturizing formula also contains Centella Asiatica, Dead Sea minerals, Argan oil, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Coconut oil, and Sweet Almond oil. Relieve dryness, and restore your skin elasticity with its plumping hydration. Give Your Skin a Boost Hexapeptide-9 is a collagen peptide that helps contribute to skin rejuvenation. As your skin matures and you notice sagging, fine lines, and wrinkles - Collagen peptide can help boost your skin's elasticity, and firmness. Additionally, these ingredients can help skin renewal, which creates a more youthful complexion. Usage: Daily apply a small amount with circular movements on cleansed skin. Use consistently to help reduce wrinkles, and fine lines, and leave you feeling confident, glowing, and beautiful! Scroll Up, Add to Cart, and Start Your New Skin Care Routine Today
